entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
